snippet: The California Supreme Court on Monday upheld the right of local governments to ban medical marijuana dispensaries.
abstract: California Supreme Court upholds right of local governments to ban medical marijuana dispensaries; many municipalities have used zoning laws to prohibit dispensaries from opening since California became the first state to allow medical marijuana in 1996.
lead_paragraph: The California Supreme Court on Monday upheld the right of local governments to ban medical marijuana dispensaries.

headline.seo: California: Court Upholds Ban on Marijuana Dispensaries
headline.main: California: Court Upholds Ban on Marijuana Dispensaries
headline.print_headline: California: Court Upholds Ban On Marijuana Dispensaries
